attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A clinical trial shows that a generative AI therapy bot can be as effective as traditional human therapy for treating depression, anxiety, and related issues.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Anthropic has created a method to observe the internal processes of large language models, providing new insights into their reasoning and response formulation.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: OpenAI has launched a new image generator aimed at designers and advertisers, focusing on practical and controlled visual creation instead of abstract art.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: China has built numerous AI data centers in anticipation of the AI boom, but many remain unused, highlighting potential overinvestment in AI infrastructure.
